website_summaries.verdict: A food scale made from stainless steel that is accurate and works reliably.
pros: Will read negative weight if needed and set
Can weigh in grams, ounces, or pounds
Large display that is easy to read
cons: This scale only runs on batteries and does not have an option for an AC cord
Also only weighs in full grams

customer_reviews.title: Broken after only 3 months!
customer_reviews.text: I started out liking this scale a lot, and using it 2-3 times a day for about three months. I used it with care - no abuse of any sort, no spills, kept clean and well cared for. A few days ago the on/off/tare button started to fail, and now it has failed completely, and the return window is only 30 days. I would have been better off buying a scale for 1/3 the cost of this one, and I recommend that you, dear reader, consider doing the same.
customer_reviews.author: TMC_Chgo

customer_reviews.title: Faulty - awaiting a replacement
customer_reviews.text: Arrived and first digit does not illuminate correctly (missing segments). Returned (paid for shipping; Amazon did not offer a replacement option). One UI oddity - button marked with a weight icon is the units button. Everyone here agrees that it intuitively implies tare, not units. Also wish scale was a little smaller. Readings seemed stable, but were not tested with a calibrated weight. The majority of reviews were good, so I am still hopeful and ordered a second one - will see if it works.
customer_reviews.author: bhubbard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. I have special dietary requirements and I weigh the contents of all my meals so I use this 3 times a day and I have found it to be very reliable. It is well made with an easy to read display. I like how it is accurate and very repeatable it is in its measurements. It is attractive and appears to be well made. I also like the battery compartment which makes it easy to replace the batteries unlike my previous scale. I can highly recommend this scale. It came quickly and without any damage.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Reali

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 years and died.  Hard to clean, terrible vendor.
customer_reviews.text: This product will be difficult to clean since the platform is raised above the base about 1/4 inch and the platform is not removable. The gap is about 2 inches deep so it would be tricky to clean, even with a Q-tip. Also, all the vendor did was throw a label on the product box and ship it. I received the box all scratched up and opened. Worst shipping from any vendor I have ever bought from on Amazon. I do not recommend Eat Smart;, they are a terrible vendor. Update Jan 2019. The scale is dead after 2 years of light use.
customer_reviews.author: A.N.Onymouse

customer_reviews.title: good size
customer_reviews.text: been using this for more than a year (maybe 2). large display, and good sized tray both contribute to a very usable product. I see some that are so tiny, like you would only weigh some herbs or a couple ounces of grated cheese. This is good for # of pounds of whatever
customer_reviews.author: Mary H

customer_reviews.title: crapped out pretty quickly
customer_reviews.text: Chews up my AAA's every 2 weeks. Also, bought this in February 2019, dead by June. By dead, I mean err code is consistently on the display. We buy scales every 12-18 months for our restaurant. This was easily the worst performing scale to date. If I bought this for home use, I think I'd still be disappointed. Too many other decent scales out there for less money.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Vandemark

customer_reviews.title: FIVE YEARS LATER
customer_reviews.text: Great accurate scale. I've had mine for over five years and it still performs very well. Used daily. I'm surprised it has lasted this long after all my bread making, with flour and liquids ending up everywhere. It also gets banged around on occasion. Batteries replaced about once per year.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: IT STOPPED WORKING AFTER A FEW MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: I used to like this scale, but I've always known that it will stop weighoing accurately after about a year. So. I replace it. But the one I received last January arrived dead. Now, a few months later, its replacement has died. And I can't figure out how to get that replaced. But why would I want a replacement anyway? It'll just die on me.
customer_reviews.author: VIRGINIA MURPHEY

customer_reviews.title: Very reliable
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one we have ordered of this scale. The previous one lasted 4 years. It lasted that long even though we managed to have melt the bottom of it shortly after buying it. We used it several times a week. So when it finally quit working we knew we had to get the same model. We are so glad you are still producing it.
customer_reviews.author: johio

customer_reviews.title: Finally a Scale You'll Love Owning!
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid cook and baker and several cookbooks I own are British showing ingredient amounts in grams. This scale has proven to be invaluable providing true and accurate gram readings to allow me to complete quite a few of these recipes with excellent results. The 'Tare' feature is wonderful when working with loose and/or liquid ingredients. Put an empty bowl on the scale and it will read its weight. While the bowl is still on the scale, press the Tare button, and the scale quickly reads 00.00 as if no bowl is present. Easy to clean; easy to read; easy to store; excellent bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.author: Jean Ault

customer_reviews.title: Solid as a rock
customer_reviews.text: It's been less than two months, but so far this scale has been a solid performer. It appears to be very accurate. (I admit I haven't bought any of the reference weights to validate this, but I've used it several times to portion out food into two serving bowls that aren't the same weight, and the difference between the bowls remains constant from use to use.) It also doesn't wander - once it establishes a weight it doesn't fluctuate. The controls are very straightforward, and give solid feedback "clicks". Best of all, you don't have to restart the scale to change from lb./oz. to kg./gm.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Nowikowski

customer_reviews.title: Best deal I could find
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I recently elected to lose weight using the "Take Shape For Life" program using Medifast foods. As a part of that program, we prepare a "lean and green" meal every day that necessitates accurate measurement of portions. Using an old mechanical scale for weighing meat portions was ponderous; taring the scale was a nightmare. This scale eliminates the fuss and bother...put on a plate, hit the button to tare the scale to zero, add the meat portion to the weight I need. Remove that plate, put on a second, hit the button to tare, weigh, eat. Simple as that. And I can use it to weigh letters and my big old cat.
customer_reviews.author: Attila the Hun

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise you can overshoot it pretty easily. Scale turns on when you place something ...
customer_reviews.text: Little slow. Which there were more incremental measurements (half gram, tenths of an ounce) so you can tell when you are about to hit your weight. Otherwise you can overshoot it pretty easily. Scale turns on when you place something on/against it, which I don't love.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M.

customer_reviews.title: It is wonderful. It works every time
customer_reviews.text: Through the years I have purchased food scales (not from Amazon). None of them have worked!! I decided to try one last time with this scale from Amazon. It is wonderful. It works every time. It weighs accurately. You can change units from pounds to grams to ounces. I love the feature that allows you to put your empty container on the scale, push the button, and it puts the weight back to 0. Then when you weigh your food, you aren't weighing the container, too. It is easy to keep clean. IT IS WONDERFUL, and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Janie

customer_reviews.title: A kitchen scale that keeps performing.
customer_reviews.text: It’s an easy to use digital scale that continues to perform. Easy to change from grams to ounces or pounds. I’m not sure how accurate it is as I don’t have any way to verify. Weighing an item and removing and re-weighing results in the same result. I use this scale instead of a measuring cup for dry ingredients for better baking results.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen scale
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item for my wife to use with her bread machine. The item is fantastic, accurate measurement, self calibrating, tare function, and plenty of surface space. Not much else we could ask for in a kitchen scale. The loaves of bread are noticeably nicer since switching to the scale for measurements. Some of the other scales i looked into, their biggest problem was not big enough for mixing bowls and whatnot, this scale will hold the entire 2lb bread pan from the baking machine so that's great. Highly recommend this product, and it seems the company's customer service record is quite phenominal as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mouthpiece

customer_reviews.title: Neatly designed scale
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small scale for my cluttered kitchen and had to be able to see the measurements because I am visually impaired.. this scale fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Geva

customer_reviews.title: and The scale worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I just finished making and freezing a bunch of burgers, and The scale worked like a charm. I used grams instead of ounces because it is a finer measurement and I couldn't be more pleased. Because of the way it is constructed I was able to see the face of the scale, instead of having to bend close and get the flashlight as I had to do on my old scale. I was impressed with this scale, simple to use yet right on with ease of use and accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Corsner

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic scale! I am a breeder of naturally reared ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic scale! I am a breeder of naturally reared performance border collies and use this to weigh my puppies until they are about 8 weeks old! Easy to use and keep clean, big numbers.
customer_reviews.author: ashley gertonson

customer_reviews.title: Uses regular batteries.
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is very accurate. One of my biggest peeves is having to spend outrageous money to replace lithium "button" cell batteries in most scales. Not this one...it uses standard 1.5V AAA batteries! Just what the wallet ordered!
customer_reviews.author: Fraud Foiler

customer_reviews.title: Just the kitchen scale I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: The large display is very easy to read, though the units indicators are a bit smaller than I'd like (even with my glasses on). As a scale, it is nice and trim, with plenty of width for larger bowls. I bought this for its gram weight capability, but I also like that it works in ounces/pounds as well. I didn't think I'd care about the quick tare to 0 feature, but must confess that it is easier than keeping track of how many grams I already had in before adding the next ingredient.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Guy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Scales for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this is the scales I've always been looking for. You may not believe it, In don't use to weigh food at all. I use it to weight my DSLR so I can safely put it on my tripod. Tripods always specify their load capacity. Thanks Eatsmart for such a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Javier G. Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Good for kitchen and postal items
customer_reviews.text: OK, first off, solid product, feels well built. Secondly, the product, inserts, packing, description all scream good customer service included. Not had to use it yet, but have no doubt that should I need to, it is going to be as good as promised. The scales work well and I have used it for postal and kitchen use a few times already. Good clear two buttons, good functions to weigh and tare.
customer_reviews.author: blackwhite

customer_reviews.title: Love the scale
customer_reviews.text: Love the scale. Had bought the a regular scale for me weighing myself from this company and that was terrific. This food scale is terrific and easy to read, especially with a plate on top of the scale. On my old scale, you couldn't ready the weight because the plate was covering it. This is very well designed and pretty accurate.
customer_reviews.author: dfine1966

customer_reviews.title: great customer service
customer_reviews.text: we've had one of these for a year or so, and it stopped working correctly. talked with manufacturer and they replaced it after sending some quick instructions on resetting. great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Scale
customer_reviews.text: I needed a food scale and wanted one with a few features. This scale is fabulous. It does everything I want. it has a stable bottom. You can put a dish on it and then start it and it will go to zero not counting the dish, then you can put your food in the dish to get the weight. You can weigh in gm or oz. it is large but not too large. I have it sitting on my counter by the stove all the time and use it every day. It is easy to use. It shipped timely and was exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Kenda

customer_reviews.title: A great kitchen scale, beyond all measure.
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful, parsimonious kitchen scale for a great price- it's easy to operate and extremely accurate. I used calibration weights on it and it was spot on! It's easy to clean and use. It's a great looking appliance and I don't know how it could be better. The seller, EatSmart, has contacted me just to offer any assistance if needed, and I just couldn't be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Narq

customer_reviews.title: Awesome scale
customer_reviews.text: We have have this scale for 7 years and still going strong. Easy to use and super functional.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect scale!
customer_reviews.text: This scale is perfect for me! I use it constantly as it is ready to go with a button push and a count if 1-2-3. It has readily adjusted some of my portion control issues, as well as making a huge difference when I use measurement weighted recepies. I am a yarn spinner, and it even helps with my weighing of fiber, an unexpected bonus! It is so much better all around than my last scale, it probably will never move from the counter to a drawer. No more guess work, I " know".
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: Basically the last scale you will need. Men....HAPPY WIFE HAPPY LIFE...
customer_reviews.text: This is the mac daddy of scales here folks. large screen, large base for bowls, and a 15lb capacity. Unreal for this kind of money. Buying a second one for a backup.
customer_reviews.author: A. Nalli

customer_reviews.title: Portable scale.
customer_reviews.text: I work in the food industry and as far as this scale goes it fits my needs and then some. Battery feature makes it portable so I am not restricted to a outlet with a cord.
customer_reviews.author: Orion

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate scale
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted to weigh a portion of meat, but we didn't have a scale that she could find around the house (there is one somewhere though). So, I did some homework and chose this one. It is extremely accurate and has a good sized platform so any size plate or bowl doesn't cover the digital readout. It tares very well with any size plate/bowl we have tried. Very solid quality and good price. She subsequently found her missing scale but the battery cover was missing. We gave that one away.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth M.

customer_reviews.title: Two units broken out of the box....
customer_reviews.text: The first unit I received had the top half of the LCD not functioning. The replacement unit had a piece of plastic broken off under the weighing platform. I didn't try my luck a third time.
customer_reviews.author: Chopper

customer_reviews.title: Easy to store and works great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kitchen scale. I’m able to reset the weight as I’m adding ingredients which is a real time saver.
customer_reviews.author: Tessie

customer_reviews.title: Weighing In On The Pleased Purchase Side!
customer_reviews.text: This replaced a scale that I had or several years. There are only two buttons, quite large and easy to use. It is very easy to cycle through the measuring units. I have no problems using the power button to tare the scale. i find having to hold thr power button down for s second or two to be a positive feature. The backlit display is clear and easy to read. I'm VERY pleased with the purchase, would buy this scale again and recommend it to anyone with a need for straight forward, easy weighing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice, Invaluable Diet Tool
customer_reviews.text: Easy to read, exceptional build and quality finish. Read the specs for more. Far better than the Cuisinart this replaced (and we had been Cuisinart customers for numerous appliances). Invaluable tool for accurate food measurements (correct daily protein intake, food measurements, etc) and, therefore, proper diet. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: DRailroad

customer_reviews.title: standard batteries easy to find
customer_reviews.text: This scale is a solid performer. Quick and accurate, multiple weighing options at the touch of a finger up front, standard batteries easy to find. The large weighing surface and 15# maximum allow one to weigh larger pots or plates and still see the read out. I'm very pleased. A removable platform for cleaning would be a plus, but I have never had a scale with this feature and it is easy enough to clean as is.
customer_reviews.author: WAM

customer_reviews.title: Buy it you need this scale in your kitchen!! 🥰
customer_reviews.text: the best scale!!! Love it!!! Good quality and so many options!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kennaith

customer_reviews.title: Price keeps going up.  Quality keeps going down.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this scale in my bakery for years. I’ve probably bought 15 of them. It is more expensive than ever and they are not lasting as long as they used to. I used to be able to make them last a year, now I’m lucky to get three months.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Potter

customer_reviews.title: The Best Food Scale
customer_reviews.text: It's not pretty or adorable, as many kitchen items are these days, but this scale is precise and very friendly to use. There is no learning curve on this handy scale, and what I like about it, again, is its accuracy. I've had several other food scales that were more attractive in design but not as practical. I highly recommend this scale. I mostly use it for measuring food to be precise on my diet, and it never lets me down.
customer_reviews.author: Shopgirl

customer_reviews.title: Dead on accurate
customer_reviews.text: Excellent scale and dead on accuracy. I have a 200 gram certified weight. The scale nails it dead on 200 grams. Easy to use, easy to clean. Very good scale. Very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kar Dell

customer_reviews.title: This is a winner!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this scale about 2 months ago. It sits on my counter all the time. Easy to use. I love the "tare" function. I can use any container for whatever I am weighing so the scale never gets dirty. I retired an old analog Weight Watchers Scale which was not nearly as acurate and because this is so easy, I find myself weighing food much more frequently which means I have much better portion control. I will be doing more baking and I am sure it will prove its worth then as well. I would recommend this to every serious cook and/or dieter.
customer_reviews.author: L. Morehouse

customer_reviews.title: Great scale, tiny issue
customer_reviews.text: This scale is very accurate and the weight doesn't fluctuate if the item is on a different part of the plate so I'm not wondering where is the right weight - it's all right! The tiny issue that it has is that it will sometimes turn on by itself. This doesn't bother me a lot and doesn't affect it's performance. The seller offered to replace since the source of the problem could not be determined, but I don't think it's a big enough issue to warrant a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Shy

customer_reviews.title: works great easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I do a fair amount of canning and needed a scale that went above 4lbs like most smaller kitchen scales do. Only had it about a week but love it so far. Had to weigh out 9lbs tomatoes and it was very accurate. I also like the fact that I can put a dinner plate on it when I'm weighing my food and can still see the numbers. Another great feature is when you hit the power button twice even when something is on the scale it 0's it out.
customer_reviews.author: inajam

customer_reviews.title: EatSmart Precision Elite Digital Kitchen Scale
customer_reviews.text: What a great value for the money! My daughter bought a scale to weigh out flour rather than measure by the cup as recommended by the Gluten Free Girl. She told me the brand that she bought and I looked at it. When I checked further for one that was less costly, I found this one. It does everything that her's does and yet was more reasonably priced. I have no regrets in purchasing the EatSmart scale. Delivery from the vendor was great too.
customer_reviews.author: Transformed

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for weighing my dogs’ raw food. I add all the supplements, zero it out and then add the meat. Easy to clean which is important because raw meat can be messy!
customer_reviews.author: K9mom

customer_reviews.title: Great scale
customer_reviews.text: The scale is a very durable build. Very easy to use. Offers variety of weight options from ounces, pounds, and grams. Metal surface is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Fountain

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: We had been using another non-digital scales in our kitchen for quite some time and my husband decided he wanted to try digital since all the cooking shows use them. After reading the other reviews we opted for this product because of the size of the balance top. It really is much larger than most scales we had seen and the options for the weight display is a plus. We are extremely happy we purchased this particular set of scales.
customer_reviews.author: Nana Gardens 2

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully...
customer_reviews.text: This food scale works beautifully and was exactly what I was looking for in such a product. The only problem I have had is the product's box was torn when it arrived and it is missing the battery cover! I have not yet spoken with their customer service department, so I cannot yet comment on that aspect of this company. However, the unit itself works very well (we have been measuring in both grams as well as ounces, is very easy to clean, is thin and light and is extremely easy to use. Simply place your measuring cup or bowl on the stand, turn it on and it automatically tares itself. Very happy with its functionality!
customer_reviews.author: Mark and Lois Mummer

customer_reviews.title: A scale for many uses
customer_reviews.text: I use it for food and to weigh smaller packages. It is great. Recently, I weighed some gold jewelry with the GM weight. LOVE this scale. Great price for it too!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonPrinzess

customer_reviews.title: Great scale!
customer_reviews.text: Best kitchen scale I've ever had. The design is simple to use and read, it's easy to clean -- a bit bulkier than my previous ones, but so much easier to use, and you can put larger items on it without obscuring the numbers.
customer_reviews.author: P. Willson

customer_reviews.title: This scale has it all.
customer_reviews.text: Love this scale. I have had 3 scales and this one is the best. Simple triple "A" batteries, easy to read with large large bowl, easy to adjust. Also easy to store, I keep it in my dish towel drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: Scale looks and feels solid to hold a big bowl when measuring.. is possible to measure in lbs, oz, and its fractions, also grams but no fractions on this kind ...but is understandable because one grams is not a big difference when trying to be precise. you zero out the scale every time you place a bowl or plate.. for example coffee; you can place the basket on scale, zero out then add the coffee to get exactly the amount you need.
customer_reviews.author: Pako

customer_reviews.title: Has all the right stuff!
customer_reviews.text: After searching for two hours, this one was just the right one. The back-lit screen is easy to read. It's accurate and he loves the way it zeroes out after weighing the mixing bowl/pan/pot. The three minute shut-off gives him plenty of time to work. It cleans well and looks sleek in our kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Kitchen Scale
customer_reviews.text: Works great and well worth the money, which wasn't bad. Big digital numbers makes it easy to read and uses normal batteries which is a plus. The tray on top is wide enough and long enough to handle most foods easily - I do us wax paper before putting anything on it so as to keep the tray relatively clean for easy clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: My Soapmaking Scale
customer_reviews.text: Love the scale. I only use it for soapmaking right now and have not used it to weigh any foods, however, I do think I need to buy a calibrator weight to make sure it weighs accurately as I have seen it add a few extras on it unexpectedly. However, I love my scale and take care of it very well as it is a beautiful scale.
customer_reviews.author: Diamonds

customer_reviews.title: love this scale
customer_reviews.text: It is a convenient size and doesn't take up much room! We have already found multiple uses for it as my husband is a baker and I love to cook in general. I used to weigh produce in the store to get an idea of quantity. Now I have a way to do it at home. The quality appears to be very good. The metal top wipes clean. Don't know why I didn't buy it sooner!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: But like I said
customer_reviews.text: I gave it five stars, so the following are just tiny nitpicks. The buttons are a little stiff, I prefer easier to press buttons. For a device as simple as this, I prefer one button per function. That would mean a dedicated "Tare" button, instead of using the power button to tare. But like I said, those are minor things. All in all, this scale does what it says it will. I really like how when you weigh in ounces it will switch to pounds at more then 16 ounces. Similarly with grams to kilograms when weighing more than 999 grams. Excellent value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Eotm

customer_reviews.title: Great Scale
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 other scales before I finally found this one that A. actually worked, B. was accurate, and C. had both metric and imperial units. This scale fits the bill almost perfectly. It is accurate - which is the most important part. I tested it when I first got it and thus far have had no botched recipes. It measures in ounces, pounds, grams, and kilograms. I do wish it had milliliters, but I can manage without that. You can convert between the units, which is an essential function of a good scale in my opinion. Overall this is a great scale and I use it multiple times daily. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Green

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 4 years
customer_reviews.text: When it works, it's great. It lasted 4 years. Then, then spring holding the batteries in place broke off. I hoped it would last longer, but the craftsmanship apparently isn't that great.
customer_reviews.author: E.W.

customer_reviews.title: Look no further...
customer_reviews.text: Great scale. I used calibrated weights and found it to be dead on accurate. One button simple to operate On//Tare/Off. Easy to wipe clean. I have never had it time out on me while in the middle. Resets the timeout when adding new ingredients. I have had a number of scales and this one is the best.
customer_reviews.author: A. Martin

customer_reviews.title: I have an EatSmart bathroom scale as well which is also a fantastic product. The kitchen scale is extremely accurate especially
customer_reviews.text: Product just as described in other reviews. Well designed. Simple to use. I have an EatSmart bathroom scale as well which is also a fantastic product. The kitchen scale is extremely accurate especially considering it goes up to 15 lb. I purchased a 100 gm reference weight and it weighed in at exactly 100 gms on the scale. The Tare feature along with the large easy to read display make for a very useful and convenient product. I would gladly recommend. Be advised that if you need precise measurements in the sub gram range you will need to by a scale that specializes in small weights.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works fine for this purpose and the weighing area is even ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to weigh my cat who has been ill. It works fine for this purpose and the weighing area is even large enough to get all 4 paws on it. It was a good purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JH of BBAR

customer_reviews.title: ACCURACY
customer_reviews.text: As near as I can tell the scale is dead on accurate. I've used it a number of times for making pizza dough and cheese cake and is near as I can tell, again , it's always accurate. have you heard of the way things wave very little and things up to 10 pounds and never had a concern a question as to whether or not the amount is correct. Everytime I turn it on it turns out. Great scale for the money wouldn't hesitate to do it again. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: go

customer_reviews.title: Great to keep you on track
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for both measuring food for both portion size and baking. It works very well with small and large quantities. The only thing I have noticed that if you are using a heavier bowl, like a glass bowl, and measuring something fairly light it does not always register or register accurately. Overall I think this is a minor thing for me and I have noticed that if I use a light plastic bowl this can be avoided. I would recommend this scale!
customer_reviews.author: jpkuhn60

customer_reviews.title: Best Digital Kitchen Scale I've seen
customer_reviews.text: This is my third digital kitchen scale and it's easily the best yet. There have been no negatives thus far. The platform is large enough for most containers you would use without taking an unreasonable amount of counter space. The stainless steel is easy to clean. The display is easy to read. The combination of 15 lb capacity with gram precision is incredible. I like that it uses AAA batteries that are easier to find and last longer than the button batteries used in some scales. It is an excellent design that I have no problem recommending to anyone looking for a digital kitchen scale.
customer_reviews.author: Rex B. Ivie, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: Worried about the scale sticking but so far so go. I have had my last scale for many many years but wanted something for larger plates and this works well for that. Took a while to get used to count down but the scale reads so much faster than my old digital. I purchased EatSmart after owning my Bathroom scale for so long (from the same company) and it has been awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Behnke

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: * It powers on fast * It adapts quickly and easily when you put a container on it * It's very accurate * It's wide base makes it easy to use with large size containers * It's large display makes it very readable Great purchase, will be happy to have this for many years and would immediately buy another if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Really easy and accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Great scale. Super simple to use. There are two buttons, but you only need one. The one on the left is for choosing the unit of measurement. grams, kilograms, ounces or pounds. I set it for ounces. Once it goes over 16 ounces it automatically switches to pounds. Neat. After the the right hand button does everything. I measure dog food. I zero the container and then add the kibble. The scale is so accurate it will change when as each piece is added. The 7.5" x 7.5" surface that the container sets on is raised above the Backlit screen. That means the container can be larger than.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore Hedtke

customer_reviews.title: Large LCD display and very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great scale! The LCD display is very large and easy to read. This has a nice heavy feel to it and is easy to use - just two buttons on the unit. Note the dimensions of the product, as it was a bit larger than most other kitchen scales I looked at. Perfect for our needs in our kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Love this scale
customer_reviews.text: Love this scale! I've had it for over a year and it still works like a charm. I like that it's big enough to weigh items on a dinner plate while still being able to read the display. I also like that it stays on for a long time instead of timing out if I step away for more that a few seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Accurate EatSmart Digital scale and Outstanding Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Love this EatSmart Precision digital scale! This product does everything it claims to do with great accuracy. But, even more important, the EatSmart Products Company stands behind their product and has outstanding customer service. I highly recommend the scale and the EatSmart company.
customer_reviews.author: Chesapeake

customer_reviews.title: Great scale to measure out food in support of daily food tracking/dieting
customer_reviews.text: Only had this scale, which is my very first scale, for a week and it does everything I need. I purchased this product for its features, design, and what seems to be wonderful customer support as described by other reviewers. I love the tare function that zeros the measurement after adding a plate or bowl on the scale. This then allows me to accurately measure my food by gradually adding on the scale. Additionally, changing units of measurements like ounces to grams was super easy to do. With large numbers on a backlit display, there's very little room for error with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Palmore

customer_reviews.title: Larger size - Nice Features
customer_reviews.text: It's a little larger than my last kitchen scale, but the size is better for weighing food on plates. It has nice features, like selectable measurement units and the "Tare" function that lets you zero out the scale to measure multiple items. Since I just got the scale, I can't speak to the long-term reliability of this product.
customer_reviews.author: CDawg

customer_reviews.title: Great scale that aids my work
customer_reviews.text: Small compact and accurate. Just what I needed to travel with.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Great scale
customer_reviews.text: The scale is really nice and I like it for what I do but there is one thing wrong and that is the display needs to be look at straight on. I have a couple of eatsmart scales and I like them but sometimes on a kitchen scale you are not looking head on. Otherwise this scale is great for all that I do with it.
customer_reviews.author: P. Pieri

customer_reviews.title: Super well made and solid looking
customer_reviews.text: Just got it. Super well made and solid looking. Put the (included) batteries in it...never read any instructions and figured it right out. Looks like a bargain. Takes up quite a bit of counter space....but that is on purpose. No balancing on a little scale. This looks like a good one.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent scale
customer_reviews.text: I really love this scale. I love that I can so easily switch between grams and ounces and I love that it is so versatile. We have used it in the kitchen for cooking, for making lip balms and lotions and even for weighing newborn puppies.
customer_reviews.author: A. Brant

customer_reviews.title: I've had several weight scales for my business but this one is way better. Durable
customer_reviews.text: Buy this! I've had several weight scales for my business but this one is way better. Durable, stainless, stays put, has a larger top area to sit things on. Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't weight your options ...
customer_reviews.text: ... buy this unit. After four years still great, still accurate. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, works perfectly and intuitively.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, easy to clean and the most important thing is that it works perfectly. Bought a 50 gm weight and scale came out of the box perfectly calibrated. Batteries were even included and easy to insert. Can figure out how it works intuitively, no need to read instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Lorien

customer_reviews.title: Well Designed and Accurate
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these kitchen scales, one at home and one in our vacation house. It's simplicity combined with accuracy and design made it worth the above average cost. Design details that were important to me were the size of the large digital readout with a backlit screen, and the low profile combined with the size of the base. The large based allows an easy scale reading even when the bowl or package weighed is large. I've been using the first one almost daily for over a year and there's no sign the batteries are weakening.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: What A Champ
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for portion control in our restaurant. Have used it dozens of times daily for over a year and have had no problems. Accurate, durable. What more do you want? Oh yeah, very reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Read Writer

customer_reviews.title: Best Scale I Have Found
customer_reviews.text: Really did my homework when looking for a digital food scale. And I am sure I have found a winner. There are many great features about this scale. First the fact that the buttons are sealed is a great PRO, dont have to worry about food spills, nothing can get in the buttons! Second the platform is the perfect size, can put a full size dinner plate on the scale and still easily read the weight. So far, I have not found a single thing I dislike about this scale.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: I think you'll like it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this scale in part because of the outstanding reviews for customer service and I'm not disappointed. I received my scale before the promised date and the scale is great. A competitor has a "pull out" digit display but I don't think you'll need it with this scale. I used a large dinner plate to weigh some food and the display was not obstructed at all -- easy to set up (unwrap, insert the batteries that come with the scale, and you are ready to go) and easy to use. I would recommend this product and EatSmart -- great product and great service! The EatSmart Precision Elite Digital Kitchen Scale and MyFitnessPal.com are a great pair!
customer_reviews.author: MAT

customer_reviews.title: Ideal scale for food weighing
customer_reviews.text: If you are keeping track of the amount of food you eat, this scale fits the bill. The large display & simple interface makes this scale a keeper. Also, the platen is plenty large enough to place an entire plate of food (or bowl, etc), and the tare function allows one to keep track of each portion of food as it is added to the same plate. The scale is very accurate too; I checked it using various calibrated weights and the scale read within the specifications. Very nice scale
customer_reviews.author: Julie A. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Good little scale!
customer_reviews.text: 1.Display is easy to read- 2. Platform is big enough to hold a plate but overall size of scale is small enough that it doesn't take up much room on the counter top- 3. Weight expressed in ounces, pounds, or grams is very convenient when trying to calculate a serving- 4. I haven't had the scale very long so I don't know how it will wear, but so far I'm very pleased with it- I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: shelperk

customer_reviews.title: Never had a scale before -- didn't know what I was missing
customer_reviews.text: Attractive, lightweight yet solid feel, super easy to use. I got this mainly for portion control and calorie counting and I can see how helpful it will be if I decide to do any serious baking. The tare function works great, allowing me to keep adding things to the same container but weighing them separately without an additional step. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Reno Gulch

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Lovely product and it works as described. I started using recipes that were from other countries and I don't know about you but if it's not in cups or tsps than I have a hard time making ethnic foods. A lot of times these recipes come in lbs. and this food scale has made cooking and prepwork a lot more enjoyable. Lovely and practical.
customer_reviews.author: It

customer_reviews.title: Lose weight!
customer_reviews.text: Now I don’t overeat. I measure everything and by the time I’m finished I’m no longer interested in cooking a big meal. Just make something small and I’m done! Fantastic product! I’ve lost 10 lbs already.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Big numbers to read, light weight. Toggles through ounces, pounds, grams. My only disappointment is after one use the top plate somehow became stained (plate is not removable) and the stain will not come out at all. Battery powered and shuts itself off after a short period of inactivity.
customer_reviews.author: Velikova

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: this scale has been a wonderful addition to our kitchen! It works exactly as described - which is perfect and extremely easy. It sits directly on the counter top and does not really take up much room. It is great when trying to really see what portion sizes are. We have recommended this to others - just love it!
customer_reviews.author: Oma

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Use Scale
customer_reviews.text: I love this scale. I'm actually happy my prior scale broke. This is one of the best scales I have used. You have a couple of different weight modes you can use and the button to change them is easily accessible at the top. The numbers are large and easy to read. When I have a plate on top to measure food you can still see the numbers - something that isn't so easy with other scales. I'd highly recommend this scale.
customer_reviews.author: Gabbie

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I use this for food, homemade product-making, and for calculating shipping charges.. basically anything under 15lbs I need to weigh. What can I say, it works. I like the option of easily switching between units (eg. pounds (lbs) to ounces (oz) to grams (g)), and the tare option is great when measuring ingredients, especially when baking. A simple scale that works well. It is a little pricey, though.
customer_reviews.author: Deig876

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Good size, seems to be very accurate. Good size platform. Was very important to my son that it didn't turn off too quickly. Readout easy to see. I will update if any issues, have had it just 3 weeks but so far is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: A Great Kitchen Scale That Is Easy To Use.
customer_reviews.text: This is a real good quality kitchen scale. I have used it now for awhile and it is very helpful is precisely measuring ingredients. I would recommend it to others without any reservations.
customer_reviews.author: LGS

customer_reviews.title: I love this scale
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an unreliable scale I'd been using to weigh ingredients for bread making. I love this scale! It's so easy to use, has a large read out and lets me weigh in pounds, ounces and grams. Perfect! I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: gmkathy

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to replace my old analog scale with a new digital, precise and easy to use for all kinds of things kitchen scale. After searching and reading great amount of reviews I settled on EatSmart Scale. I am very happy with the decision. I bake bread and needed a scale which would accommodate a large bowl. It does that. It is small for easy storage. I think it is quite accurate. I like that it can measure in grams, ounces and pounds and has only 2 buttons. I've owned it for over a month, use it regularly and haven't experienced any problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: marisok

customer_reviews.title: Does everything it says on the box.
customer_reviews.text: Does everything it says on the box, I had to keep useing different kitchen scales for different measurements now I can do the whole lot on this Scale and does NOT keep moving back to zero like some scales excellent very pleased indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great scale
customer_reviews.text: Excellent scale. I bought this for soap making because it has greater accuracy for measuring the ingredients. Works well, and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sutcliffe

product_meta.title: EatSmart Precision Elite Scale-15 lb. Capacity, UltraBright Display and Stai Digital Kitchen Scale, One Size, Silver
product_meta.description: The EatSmart precision Elite digital kitchen scale is the chef-preferred food scale for everyday use. From weighing food to monitoring caloric intake, The precision Elite provides exactly what its name States - reliably precise measurements Every time. In fact, this cooking scale was designed in conjunction with professional chefs and bakers to represent the Elite in kitchen scales on the market today. EatSmart precision sensors are accurate to the nearest 0. 5 oz./1 gram, which is ideal for baking. The Tare feature subtracts the weight of a container and allows chefs to weigh multiple items in a row With ease, while the oversized, durable stainless steel platform is ample enough to accommodate large mixing bowls and plates. The precision Elite provides accurate food weight readings up to 15 lbs. /7 kg. In four measurement units - ounces, pounds, grams, and kilograms. The display also features a crystal-white backlight for easy reading in any lighting condition. Manufactured to the highest quality specifications, The precision Elite provides chefs With the information they need to create consistent, delicious recipes and keep track of their health. In addition to 4 AAA batteries, a free Calorie factors booklet is also included to help you master Calorie counting and portion control with your scale.
feature_bullets: This professional food scale features an extra-large lighted display and stainless steel platform
Weighs up to 15 pounds in. 05 oz./1 gram increments
The Tare feature zeroes out the Weight of a plate or container, while the 3 minute auto shut-off feature extends battery life
A bonus EatSmart calorie factors guide provides calorie counting and portion control tips to use with your scale
Includes 4 AAA batteries and our 100% EatSmart satisfaction

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,104 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
